text: Well, welcome to Germany.

Like walking around here you're almost feeling
like you've been transported back to Bavaria.

And this is a town that I'm very familiar
with because I actually grew up in a local

village that was only 30 minutes away from
here.

So we're going to be taking a little tour
of the town.

Some beer, pastries, who knows.
We'll see what is on the menu.

So this is kind of a cool sign because it
shows all of the different festivals that
happen here throughout the year.

And we have a Christmas fair, an Alpine chocolate
festival, a Viennese pastry festival and also
Oktoberfest.
Oktoberfest.
Where they drink beer in their giant pints.
Prost!

Like you said, it feels like it is straight

It is fun.
